Dialogue.Page: How's it going? My name is orclecle.
I made Translation and Patches for The Outsider, and now it is integrated into The Outsider itself.
Also, I am making Pick Up Chert now. After releasing, please pick them up, and go to everywhere!
I go by "orclecle" on the Outer Wilds modding discord, feel free to stop by and chat!
